SEARCH
Package org.cst8288Lab2.dboperations

Class DBOperations

java.lang.Object
org.cst8288Lab2.dboperations.DBOperations
public class DBOperations extends Object
This class contains methods which will perform insert operations on a database. Contains methods which will insert a Student, Course, or StudentCourse.
Version:
Java 17
Author:
Dan Blais

  • Method Details

    • createStudent

      public static void createStudent(Student student)
      This method inserts a Student into the database
      Parameters:

    • createCourse

      This method inserts a Course into the database

    • createStudentCourse

      public static void createStudentCourse(StudentCourse studentCourse, Student student, Course course)
      This method inserts a StudentCourse into the database based on values from Student and Course parameters.
      Parameters:
      studentCourse - The studentCourse to insert
      student - The student related to the studentCourse
      course - The course related to the studentCourse
